get.description: Retrieve a list of debug information files for a given project.
get.operationId: List a Project's Debug Information Files

parameters.name: organization_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the organization the file belongs to.

parameters.name: project_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the project to list the DIFs of.

404.description: The requested resource does not exist

post.description:
Upload a new debug information file for the given release.

Unlike other API requests, files must be uploaded using the
traditional multipart/form-data content-type.

The file uploaded is a zip archive of an Apple .dSYM folder which
contains the individual debug images.  Uploading through this endpoint
will create different files for the contained images.

parameters.name: organization_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the organization the project belongs to.

parameters.name: project_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the project to upload a file to.

404.description: The requested resource does not exist

delete.description: Delete a debug information file for a given project.
delete.operationId: Delete a Specific Project's Debug Information File

parameters.name: organization_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the organization the file belongs to.

parameters.name: project_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the project to delete the DIF.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the DIF to delete.

404.description: The requested resource does not exist
